title: COVID and the Economy, China
itunes:title: COVID and the Economy, China
description:
Guests: Deepa, Mahajan, Partner at McKinsey and Company in San Francisco, Tom Orlik, Bloomberg Economics Chief Economist and author of the new book, "China, The Bubble That Never Pops," and Frank Maisano, Partner at Bracewell’s Policy Resolution Group.

Bloomberg Businessweek host Jason Kelly spoke exclusively to LeBron James and Maverick Carter about James' mission to combat voter suppression.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
